topic.title: Configuring a Microsoft SQL Server Connection

body.p:
To configure the support for a Microsoft SQL Server database, follow this procedure:
Download the appropriate MS SQL JDBC driver from the Microsoft website. For SQL Server 2008 R2 and older go to . For SQL Server 2012 and 2014 go to .
Configure MS SQL Server Data Source drivers.
Configure a MS SQL Server Connection.
To view your connection, go to the Data Source Explorer view or switch to the Database perspective.
